title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person die again

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead person die again: The dream of death is one of the most disturbing dreams that the children of Adam have seen, especially if you see friends, relatives, partners, and loved ones dying in the dream, as this is even more disturbing. With the great suffering of these dreams, but the leading interpreters said that most of these dreams are good omens and good luck and a great living, and they can be a bad omen at other times and in distress and anxiety, and it all depends on the nature of this death in the dream and the person’s condition, we will discuss this The topic detailed in our article on our website is different. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person dying again? Many dream interpreters have confirmed that the dream is closely related to the psychological state and other influences that exist around the person in life, as all of these factors have the ability to control the dreams that A person sees it during his sleep. The interpretation of seeing a dead person dying again symbolizes his death, causing harm to the dreamer and causing his emotions to shift towards sadness. The interpretation of seeing a dead person dying again refers to the last moments of that dead person, which are constantly repeated and come to the dreamer’s mind in Free hours and isolation. If the dreamer is sick, the interpretation of seeing a dead person dying again symbolizes the improvement of the person’s condition, recovery, and the death of all negative feelings. The interpretation of seeing a dead person dying again is interpreted as the first death that occurs in this world, but death again does not exist. He has only the resurrection and then the reckoning in the hands of God Almighty. The interpretation of seeing a dead person dying again is closely related to whether you hear the screams or not. The interpretation of seeing the dead person dying again also explains the deposits and money that the deceased leaves for the person who dreams of deposits and boxes being delivered and working. Accordingly, a duty and debt is on his neck until he meets the Almighty. God. As for the interpretation of seeing the dead person die again, the viewing expresses immediate happiness and the gradual improvement is the improvement after loss, trouble and sadness. He says seeing the dead one is not dead. If the dreamer sees that a deceased family member came in a dream and told him that he is alive and has not died, then this testimony is wonderful. It is praiseworthy because it confirms that the dead person enjoys Paradise and its blessings. This opinion also confirms the position of the dead person among the witnesses. It means that the dead person says that he did not die, and this indicates that he died of martyrdom and monotheism. What reaches the tongue of the dead in a dream is sincerity, and there is no doubt about it, according to a narration Many interpreters, because he is in the abode of truth. And if the deceased comes to the dreamer in a dream that he has not left this world and wears a crown on his head, then this witness indicates the status of this deceased in the afterlife. See also: Interpretation of the vision of reading the Qur’an. Interpretation of seeing a dead person dying again by Ibn Sirin. It is It indicates joy and comfort if there was crying in the dream when he saw this sight. As for whoever sees a dead person, he knows his death again, it is possible that this is a sign of the death of one of the dead’s relatives or members of his household, and God Almighty knows best. Sheikh Ibn Shirin goes on to say: If He saw the deceased dead in a dream again, and he was

title: Interpretation of a dream about praying for the funeral of a dead person in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of praying for the dead is unknown in the mosque. I dreamed of the dead being alive. Father, mother, sister, husband, coming out of the grave alive. He spoke about burying the dead again. Interpretation of prayer for the dead. Funeral: Whoever is seen praying at a funeral and then people accompany him. Funeral prayer is a real vision (i.e. it can be fulfilled on earth). Whoever sees that he is praying at a funeral. A dead person then portends a broken heart, or what you said to this scholar is his trick. Whoever sees the death of the Prophet Muhammad, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him and his family, praying upon him, this means the death of a scholar. Whoever sees the death of a companion and praying upon him: one who follows the Messenger Muhammad and follows the Sunnah. As for praying upon him The dead person has a lot of supplication and seeking forgiveness. Whoever dreams that he is standing behind an imam praying for the dead person, he is participating in a meeting in which they pray for the dead person. Interpretation of a funeral in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Sheikh Muhammad bin Sirin mentioned that seeing a funeral and walking behind a funeral in a dream means that you are following the dreamer and walking behind an unjust and corrupt sultan. A new friendship. Interpretation of the box in a dream by Ibn Sirin. As for seeing a casket or casket in a dream, it indicates his highness and status in the souls of those around him, with regard to kindness and living, or marrying a newborn or giving birth to a male child, as it is a representation that symbolizes him. The journey: Interpretation of the funeral of the deceased in a dream. As for the interpretation of seeing the funeral of the deceased in a dream, it indicates the bad psychological state that the dreamer is experiencing and symbolizes the deep and profound sadness within him and it can portend deteriorating financial conditions or difficult academic conditions, while for an unmarried girl the dream indicates a fleeting state of distress. Pain and depression. Interpretation of a funeral in a woman’s dream: A funeral in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes the anxiety, sadness, pain, and anguish that she experiences. As for the funeral in a married woman’s dream, it is interpreted by two symbols and meanings. Seeing the funeral of a person known to himself who is still alive in a dream portends family and marital problems and disagreements that may lead to divorce. Then this heralds her pregnancy. Interpretation of an unknown funeral in a dream. As for seeing the funeral of someone the dreamer does not know, it portends trouble, failure, despair, and loss, and this vision is one of the worst dreams ever, as interpreters considered it a bad omen and the beginning of the end. It may be illness, death, bankruptcy, severe psychological exhaustion, or abandonment, and therefore this vision is a warning to the dreamer not to give in to despair and to pray a lot and draw closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of walking in a funeral in a dream: Seeing walking in the funeral of someone you know is evidence of... That he will bid farewell soon in reality, and walking at the funeral of someone you do not know portends evil or misfortune that will befall the dreamer, and his presence in the funeral procession indicates that the dreamer will not die until he has enjoyed all the blessings of the world, and God alone knows, especially if he attends. Consolation, because it portends success and piety. Interpretation of the funeral of a martyr in a dream: In general, seeing the funeral of a martyr in a dream is a sign of raising the fortuneteller’s status and success, and the funeral of a martyr in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of engagement or marriage, and the funeral of a female witness in her dream. A married woman is a sign of pregnancy or good fortune

title: The 9 most famous interpretations of seeing a car in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a single woman driving a car with someone she knows? It shows her upcoming wedding. The interpretation of seeing a single woman buying a car in a dream? Evidence of kindness and broad nourishment. What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant car in a dream? Evidence of having a male child. Interpretation of driving a car in a dream? Proof of a girl’s confidence By herself, and achieving dreams and desires. Interpretation of seeing a vacation by car in a man’s dream? Elements of instability in life. Interpretation of seeing a car for individuals. Seeing an unmarried girl driving a car with someone she knows in a dream indicates her imminent marriage to this man, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. As for seeing a girl riding a car With someone she does not know, this indicates that she will marry someone she does not know soon, but this is a good thing. Seeing driving a car in a dream is a sign of a girl’s confidence in herself and the fulfillment of dreams and desires. Seeing a single girl driving a car in a dream but she is lost, indicates reality and that she She cannot manage her affairs and needs to recalculate. Seeing a single girl buying a car in a dream is evidence of kindness and ample nourishment. Seeing a broken car indicates worries and problems in the life of an unmarried girl. Seeing a car for a married woman, and a married woman’s dream of seeing a car indicates pleasant skin with kindness. And blessings in her life. Likewise, driving a car indicates a spacious life and the fulfillment of a woman’s desires. A car vacation in a dream indicates a woman’s loss of self-confidence. As for seeing buying a car in a dream, this indicates success in study or work. Interpretation of a vision of a car for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman’s vision of a car In a dream, it is evidence of the birth of a male child, and God knows best. Also, seeing a car in a dream indicates that a pregnant woman will give birth to a good child whose parents are beautiful in appearance and personality. Seeing a man’s car. Seeing a car in a dream for an unmarried young man is evidence of his close relationship and marriage to a fair woman. Also A man seeing a car in a dream indicates a change in his situation and his planning to travel to work. Then the man sees himself driving a police car, and he prefers not to explain that, because it is evidence of worries and sorrow. As for seeing an ambulance, it is evidence of relieving worry and alleviating distress, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. The man who Driving a car quickly indicates that he will get into a lot of troubles and troubles, and God is Great and All-Knowing. As for driving a car in a man’s dream, it is a sign of instability in life, and his inability to achieve his dreams. title: Interpretation of seeing stolen gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about stealing gold in a dream. Ibn Sirin said in what was reported from him that stealing gold in a dream indicates the loss of his great status among the people by the dreamer, who committed some shameful acts that were not expected of him. Which causes him to lose his status among the people, and disappear from their eyes, so he must beware of him and watch. His actions so that he does not regret it. Seeing the fortuneteller himself stealing gold indicates the dreamer's constant fear and anxiety for many reasons in real life. Or that the monarch has been caught committing disobedience and shameful sins that instill fear in the human heart. It also narrates what can be expected to happen to the god in The next period of his life. Or what is really affecting him in the current season of calamity and hardship, such as the illness or death of a loved one. Interpretation of dreams: Gold was stolen for free. Interpretation of the vision: Stealing gold for individuals. It is a sign that her marriage is delayed because there is no one suitable for her. Or that her engagement does not continue due to problems. There is a lot between them or a lack of compatibility in passion. It also indicates in some sayings that she has been freed from the worries and problems that her life faces in the near future, God willing. If she dreams that she has obtained stolen gold, this means that she will get rid of the problems and sorrows that her real life may face. As for the one who saw in her dream that she was standing stealing gold, it is a sign of the severe difficulties that the visionary suffers from in her real life. The introduction of stolen gold in a dream for an unmarried woman portends her return to her fiancé, who broke off his engagement with her after the reasons for it disappeared. The theft of a gold ring in a dream for a married woman. Seeing Married \ Married In her dream, a gold ring was stolen from her jewelry. It contains news that she is expected to get into a lot of marital problems in the coming period of her real life, which in turn leads to tension in the relationship between her and her husband. Seeing her in her dream stealing gold indicates her desire to seize The happy moments that she hopes to live and her constant desire to fill her life with happiness and joy. If she sees that she is stealing some gold, and runs away, this indicates her constant desire and desire to live a quiet life characterized by comfort and tranquility. Interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream of stealing gold. Absolute’s vision in her dream that her gold was stolen Anonymous, Ibn Shirin says about him and Ibn Shaheen in her interpretation. This is if she is facing problems in the current period of her life. It is a sign that he will get rid of these problems, and that he will welcome a new period characterized by calm and stability. It can also be interpreted as good news for recovery from diseases And stop the ills and pains. In one of the interpretations of stealing gold in a divorced woman’s dream, it is a sign that she will get another husband, who will restore stability to her life. If you saw him stealing the neighbor’s gold and she was very sorry for what she did. This is a sign that you will receive good news in the future, God willing. Theft of a necklace in a single woman’s dream. This vision has many meanings for the single girl. As for the fiancé, it explains that she will be exposed to many problems during the coming period of her relationship with her fiancé.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a loved one in different situations

preview.html: In this article, you can see the interpretation of a dream about the death of a loved one and its meaning for you in detail. Seeing the death of relatives or friends is one of the most common and disturbing visions that dreamers have and the dreamer can wonder if seeing a loved one dying in a dream why he would not wish it at all in reality. Therefore, this dream of the dreamer turns into a nightmare for him and can cause his psychological state to deteriorate during the day. There is a common belief that this vision means the death of the person who dreamed it, except death. Man does not know his time except God, but there are other interpretations of this dream mentioned by the dream interpretation scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin about this vision, and you will find these interpretations in his encyclopedia.Interpretation of a dream about the death of someone you love. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about the death of someone you love in a dream. Ibn Sirin showed that seeing death in general It indicates the changes that the dreamer is going through in reality, whether academic, professional, or emotional. In the event of the death of family members, if the dreamer sees the death of his father in a dream, this vision indicates his sadness over being seriously separated from him. Seeing the death of a father in a dream means That the dreamer will be exposed to a major problem that will end with the help of a family member, and God knows best. If the vision includes the father’s illness that led to his death, then this vision indicates the poor psychological state of the pioneer. As for the death of a family member, this vision indicates that this dreamer feels bad feelings Towards this relative is represented by hatred, hatred and jealousy towards him. If a person sees the death of his friend in a dream, then this dream is good news for the dreamer and indicates the coming of comfort and the removal of worries and problems from him. Interpretation of a dream about a person dying and crying over him. In the event that a person cries over the death of this person in a dream, then this vision It indicates trouble for the vision, especially if the crying is loud. Al-Nabulsi interpreted this vision as a sign of disobedience to God or the demolition of his house, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the death of a person he does not love in a dream and quarrels with him and cries over his separation, then this vision indicates his reconciliation with this person. If he sees the death of the mother and shouts loudly over her, then this vision symbolizes the good condition of the mother and the fulfillment of her duties towards her children to the fullest. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a dear person for one person. If an unmarried girl sees that a friend of hers has died in a dream and she is very sad about her separation, This vision symbolizes the death of worry and sadness on the part of the dreamer, and this dream indicates her long life. A friend. If an unmarried woman gets married in reality and sees the death of her fiancé in a dream, this vision portends the approaching of her marriage in reality, and God knows best. As for the death of a brother in a dream, this vision shows goodness and abundance, and this vision represents the acquisition of a lot of money. In general, the This vision indicates goodness, success, and success, whether academically or professionally. As for the death of the person seeing the dream in a dream, this indicates the anguish and pain that she suffers from in reality. Interpretation of the death of a loved one in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that her heart

Friend. In the event that an unmarried woman is married in reality and sees the death of her fiancé in a dream, this vision portends the approach of her marriage in reality, and God knows best. In general, this vision indicates goodness, success and success, whether academic or professional. As for the death of the visionary in a dream, this indicates the distress and pain she suffers from in reality. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of a man’s private parts according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about blood coming out of a man’s genital organsAmong the dreams that cause panic and fear among people, one of the most important interpretations is that the dreamer is suffering from problems that negatively affect his soul, and today let us discuss the interpretation of seeing blood in a dream in a more detailed way.Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of a man’s private parts According to Ibn Sirin, what is the interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of a man’s private parts? A man who dreams of blood coming out of his private parts is evidence of committing atrocities and sins, and everything that angers God (Glory be to Him), so it is necessary to approach God to seek forgiveness. Blood coming out of a man’s private parts is an indication of... He does what is forbidden, but he feels guilty, so he stops doing it the next time, and repents to God Almighty. This dream is one of the unwanted dreams, as it indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many problems and crises in the coming period, which will negatively affect his psychological health and professional life. The blood flowing from the genitals of a married man is evidence that the dreamer will face many problems in his married life, and the matter may eventually lead to divorce. Interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of a man’s private parts by Ibn Sirin. The blood that comes out of a man’s private parts in a divorced woman’s dream indicates that she will regain all Her rights from her ex-husband, plus her life will improve dramatically and she will soon marry a good man who will compensate her for the bad. The days he saw. The blood that comes out of his private organs for a man suffering from infertility is an indication that God (Glory be to Him) will grant him good offspring. Bleeding from a person’s private parts without ablution indicates that he is committing many sins, and even though he knows this, he does not feel remorse. Interpretation Dreams of blood coming out of a man’s private parts for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees blood coming out of a man’s private parts, the dream indicates that she is about to marry a righteous young man who fears God within her, but if the bleeding is heavy, this indicates that the unmarried woman will be exposed to harm. Many dangers and experiences in her life and she must be logical and wise when she thinks about it. Things before making decisions. Bleeding from a man’s vagina in a virgin girl’s dream indicates that she will be on a travel route in the coming days. The dream also indicates that she will be exposed to a difference of opinion with Her family, and it may eventually lead to her expulsion from it. Home.Interpretation of a dream of blood flowing from a man’s private parts for a married woman. Blood flowing from a man’s private parts for a married woman is a sign that she will face many problems and crises in her life. The dream also explains that in the next few moments unpleasant news will reach the married woman, which will make her suffer from heartache. It enters a period of depression. If the blood that comes out of a man’s private parts is menstrual blood, this indicates that he will obtain a lot of money, and this money will most likely come from an inheritance. If the dreamer’s husband is suffering from poverty and hardship, then the dream indicates a great improvement. In his financial situation. Interpretation of a dream about blood coming from a pregnant woman’s genital organs: The appearance of red blood from a woman’s genital organs

title: Interpretation of a dream about insects in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing insects in a dream is one of the dreams that have many meanings, but in general, most dream interpretation scholars, such as Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen, believe that insects reflect the fear and anxiety that people feel towards insects in reality, and they will recognize the most important signs that should See her. Insects in the dream, with an emphasis on not dropping any interpretation that we will mention in any other vision because the dreamer must realize that the interpretation of the vision has many factors, not just the details of the vision they saw, like the social dreamer. Its situation and some of its circumstances that the interpreter must know at the beginning before starting to interpret the vision. Interpretation of seeing insects in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The dream interpretation scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing insects in a dream indicates that the person is suffering from many sorrows and problems at this time. Also, the saying That he sees a large number of insects in his house indicates that he suffers from envy and hatred among many people. As for the opinion in a dream that insects are in his hand without harming them, this indicates the presence of a large number of negative characters in this person’s life. Seeing insects in A dream by Ibn Shaheen. Dream interpreter Ibn Shaheen says that seeing insects in a dream indicates many problems that the dreamer is currently facing. As for the insects that appear in a dream and go beyond opinion, Ibn Shaheen says that this indicates that the dreamer will face a strong enemy in life, and God knows best. As The appearance of many insects in a dream indicates that the dreamer is going through many difficulties and problems in life at this time. Seeing insects in Al-Nabulsi’s dream. Imam Al-Nabulsi says that seeing insects flying in a dream indicates that the opinion was able to succeed in his life, and God knows best. Also, Being attacked by insects in a dream indicates that the dreamer faces many problems in his life, so he must be careful. As for killing insects in a dream, this indicates that opinion has the ability to get rid of enemies, and God knows best. In addition to dreaming of dead insects, this indicates that there is Some old problems that have been revived in opinion’s life during the current period. Seeing insects in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees insects in a dream indicates that this girl is suffering from sorrows and worries during the current period of her life. Also, insects in an unmarried girl’s dream indicate On the failure of marriage and feeling miserable, and God knows best. In addition to a single girl seeing insects in a dream, this indicates friends who degrade this girl and who are not good. Just like insects in a single girl’s dream running away from insects in a dream, this indicates that this girl She will be able to succeed in her life. Seeing insects in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees insects in a dream indicates that there are some problems between her and her husband, which makes her feel anxious and sad, and God knows best. Also, escaping from insects in a married woman’s dream indicates...

title: Interpretation of hunting dogs in a dream

preview.html: Chasing dogs in a dream.. Many people suffer from panic attacks whenever they see dogs, either because of their size or frightening shape, or because of previous incidents related to dogs where they feel afraid of the human body and therefore attack. Chasing dogs in a dream Seeing dogs chasing a person during his sleep is a dream It haunts a lot of people. Dogs in a dream usually have many different interpretations. For example, they could be a reference to a friend or a woman, or his bad deeds are chasing him. Through this article, we will learn about the interpretation of hunting dogs in a dream through the website. Various. Seeing in a dream dogs chasing someone, even though dogs are loyal. Really and love people. Many dream interpreters generally agree that seeing a dog is a bad dream and indicates that something unpleasant will happen to the dreamer. Chasing dogs in a dream When the sleeper sees a dog chasing him and barking, this was a sign that he will be in danger and his condition will be revealed. Chasing Dogs in a dream If the sleeper sees a group of dogs barking at him, he may be deceived. Dog chasing in a dream When you see a dog chasing you and tearing your clothes, it means that there is someone fighting for your honor. Dog chasing in a dream Some scholars interpret a dog chasing people as things Bad and those things will haunt him in his afterlife. Chasing dogs in a dream When the sleeper sees that he is injured and attacked by a dog, this means that the dreamer is a good person, but some people want to harm him. Chasing dogs in a dream If one sees a dog running after him and then quickly disappearing, this means that his family will face Some problems, but they will succeed in surviving. Chasing dogs in a dream. In the interpretation of seeing a dog in a dream, if one sees a dog chasing him in a dream, this means that the fool is chasing him wherever he goes. He follows him just as anyone sees a flock of dogs chasing him in a dream. The dream is interpreted as A companion to people who have no honor. Chasing dogs in a dream. Whoever dreams that a dog chased him in the desert is thieves and thieves, and whoever dreams that dogs are chasing him can understand his enemies and that he will succeed in escaping from them. Chasing dogs in a dream while escaping from them means that he will be saved. From enemies and deceiving fools in debate. Read also: My experience with the trigeminal nerve and treatment methods. Seeing a dog in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a dog in a dream represents a disobedient person who does not perform his duties and deals with many religious matters imposed on us as Muslims, and hunting is an aspect of goodness. In the interpretation of the vision A dog in a dream. Whoever dreams that he is touching a dog in a dream, this is evidence that he will win by lying, because the interpretation is different. Whoever sees in his dream that he came in the form of a dog means that there is knowledge sent to him by God, but he was arrogant about it, and that God made the matter difficult. On that person. If a man sees a group of dogs barking in his dream, this indicates betrayal by that person. In the interpretation of seeing a dog in a dream, if one sees a group of dogs in a dream during his illness, this means that the person who saw

title: Interpretation of a dream about the dead giving eggs to the living

preview.html: As for seeing gifts from the dead to the living, it is a message that he wants to convey and it can be a sign for the living and depends on the situation in which the person who had the vision lives, as well as the situation. In which the deceased is located. Interpretation of seeing the dead giving eggs to live in a dream for a single girl. An unmarried girl sees that the dead is giving her eggs in a dream. The meaning of the dream is the psychological state she is in. Also, if the dead comes smiling, and the unmarried girl is giving eggs in a dream. It may be considered This is a good flogging for her, or she would have fallen into his form, but she was saved from it by the grace of Almighty God. And if the dead person gives eggs to the unmarried girl, and he looks sad in the dream. This means some psychological problems for the visionary and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Whereas the vision of the dead giving, Known to the unmarried girl, it can be interpreted as giving him eggs in a dream. Her marriage will take place soon, God willing. But if the unmarried girl saw that the unknown dead person had given her eggs, then she could not carry him in the dream. It was an opportunity that he would have had, but he could not. What if an unmarried woman saw that the deceased gave her a lot of colored eggs and smiled at her. He won the love and satisfaction of many people. The great dream interpreters reported that eggs had different shapes and colors in the dreams of one girl. D- Goodness and happiness for the dreamer. See also: Interpretation Dreaming of a dead pregnant woman. Interpretation of watching a dream giving dead eggs to the living in a dream about a married woman. The coming of the dead who lay eggs in a married woman’s dream. It is a sign of goodness that will soon come to her home, God willing. The well-known scene of the dead man laying eggs, and happiness in a married woman’s dream, was A sign of many weddings and occasions that will enter the house. But if the deceased came and was sad and gave the married woman some eggs, and she refused to take them from him in the dream. It is a sign of control over some matters related to her home. Perhaps this means seeing different eggs in a woman’s dream. The married woman. And about the large number of children, which indicates the number of children she has in reality. The interpretation of the dream of the deceased. An egg in the dream of the married woman, gives the meaning of an expected pregnancy. Or if she is not expecting pregnancy, this indicates the marriage of one of her children. The interpretation is to see many eggs in the hand of the deceased, Without giving them to a married woman in a dream. For the sake of the experiences he will go through in the coming days, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. We can see that the appropriate meaning in interpreting the vision of giving the deceased various eggs in a married woman’s dream. The deceased was known as a sign of mercy. Whereas if it was unknown And giving her eggs, this may be a problem and it will be fixed. The interpretation of seeing a dead person giving eggs to the living in a dream for a man and its meaning is that he gets married if he sees that the unknown dead person gives her eggs in a dream. These are problems and can be solved by the grace of Almighty God. While he knew the dead person and gave the married man in a dream some eggs. It is An indication of the importance of what is happening in his personal life. When the dead person comes and gives the married man an egg in a dream. He will receive...
